name: Unachievable | A story game
description:
UNACHIEVABLE the word is frightening, especially for a game jam theme. But what if we think outside the box? UNACHIEVABLE aims to do just that. It's a story game about a boy trying to win over the girl of his dreams. This game was made in 3.5 hrs for Trijam #93.

Full screen is recommend for best experience

Controls:

[a] & [d] - move

Credits:

Music - Alpha by C418

Everything else - Me 

ENJOY!
